description: Learn how to make this delicious garlic-infused wholegrain mustard vinaigrette. It's the only salad dressing you'll need this summer.
keywords: Salad dressing,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Dec 2020,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Basic Mustard Vinaigrette Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine oil, red wine vinegar, mustard and garlic cloves in a bowl. Store in a sterilised glass jar or an airtight container in the fridge for up to two weeks.
